events.name: ColdChainTemperatureOutOfRange

events.name: ColdChainDeliveryScheduled
events.description: This event signifies the scheduling of a delivery in the cold chain.

events.description: Captures the event of a delivery being completed successfully.

commands.name: ScheduleDelivery
commands.description: This event signifies the scheduling of a delivery in the cold chain.

commands.description: Captures the event of a delivery being completed successfully.

integrationPoints.name: TemperatureMonitoringSystem
